desc: 100% toxin and paraffin free soy candles. Three in one candles Aromatherapy / Hand cream / Massage oil ... Sales support charitable causes We donate a portion of each candle sale to a couple of different causes: the Skid Row Project ,Promises Foundation, and Animal Rescue . Scents of Purpose is an eco-friendly company.

layout.text: Luxurious Hand-Cream and Candle in One
